Text:
WTF?

Is that Greek? Welsh? Basque?
Greek my friend,it is a greek amateur film.
Ela re patriwtes,twra pleon exete th dynatotita na apolaysete to megaleio toy panisxyrou megistana.Mh xanete thn eykairia !!!

Thank you, Mr. M. 

The 'w' in the vowel position threw me off; I've only seen that in Welsh. I thought it was more typical for Greek to use an 'o' for that sound than 'w' in the Latin alphabet.

Anyway, thanks for the response. I really was puzzled by it.
Seedarete paidia,giati den tha ginei douleia ! Peinaei o laos gia panisxyro megistana !!
